level_up_moves.name: reversal
level_up_moves.effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.

level_up_moves.name: recover
level_up_moves.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

machine_moves.name: strength
machine_moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

machine_moves.name: toxic
machine_moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

machine_moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

machine_moves.effect: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.

machine_moves.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

machine_moves.effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

machine_moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

machine_moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

machine_moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.description: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

abilities.name: aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

abilities.name: air-lock
abilities.description: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.description: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

abilities.name: anger-point
abilities.description: Raises Attack to the maximum of six stages upon receiving a critical hit.

abilities.name: anticipation
abilities.description: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective move, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit KO move.

abilities.name: arena-trap
abilities.description: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.  Eluded by flying-types and Pokémon in the air.

abilities.name: battle-armor
abilities.description: Protects against critical hits.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.description: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

abilities.name: chlorophyll
abilities.description: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.

abilities.name: clear-body
abilities.description: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: cloud-nine
abilities.description: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

abilities.name: color-change
abilities.description: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.

abilities.name: competitive
abilities.description: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

abilities.name: compound-eyes
abilities.description: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3×.

abilities.name: contrary
abilities.description: Inverts stat changes.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.description: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.description: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.description: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

abilities.name: drizzle
abilities.description: Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

abilities.name: drought
abilities.description: Summons strong sunlight that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

abilities.name: early-bird
abilities.description: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.description: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: flame-body
abilities.description: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: flash-fire
abilities.description: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

abilities.name: forecast
abilities.description: Changes castform's type and form to match the weather.

abilities.name: friend-guard
abilities.description: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.

abilities.name: frisk
abilities.description: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.description: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: guts
abilities.description: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

abilities.name: harvest
